Mathematical Reflection Investigation 2

In this Unit, we use proportional relationships to investigate probability and solve problems. At the end of this Investigation, what do you know about probability? About proportional relationships?

At this point students can find theoretical probabilities. Students can find all the outcomes of a game to make theoretical probabilities. Students will use organized lists, tree diagrams, and multiplication to find the outcomes and the theoretical probabilities. Students will use the theoretical probabilities to make predictions on future outcomes in playing the games.

Reflections on the Mathematical Practices
